      public void editInventoryItem​(int inventoryId, String name, double price, double quantity, String measurementType)
      Update an inventory item based on variable parameters
      Parameters:
      inventoryId - the id of the item we are modifying
      name - the name of the item
      price - the price of the item
      quantity - the amount of the item in the inventory
      measurementType - the type of measurement used to measure the quantity
